about_the_game:
Gives a toggle to turn all characters into sharks, because Shark Week should be every week.

To perform this magical feat:

- When in your dorm room, you will be presented with an option for Adaptations.

- Click it and then click on SHARK WEEK.

- To turn it off, click on the REGULAR option.
detailed_description:
Gives a toggle to turn all characters into sharks, because Shark Week should be every week.

To perform this magical feat:

- When in your dorm room, you will be presented with an option for Adaptations.

- Click it and then click on SHARK WEEK.

- To turn it off, click on the REGULAR option.

fullgame.name: Paper Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date?
